Title: Just Like the Pilgrims Intended
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Nancy Pimental (teleplay), LaToya Morgan (story), Nancy Pimental (story), LaToya Morgan (staff writer)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Monica tries to kill herself, Carl shoots a bald eagle, Karen goes into labor.
